Posts.Content:
This is danny. I've never joined a forum before. I'm now 65, I discovered a lump in a self-exam in 2/02, after just one year of HRT and no family history of cancer. I was lucky to only need radiation, tamoxifen, and femara. It's been 10 years. 
I have a terrific husband who unfortunately has had prostate cancer, throat cancer, and skin cancer. He's come through them like a champ, thank goodness!
We have two wonderful daughters and three terrific grandchildren. And six cats.
Thanks!
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
